ComicInfo.Title: Mean Look; Car Trouble; Storytime
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mean Look: Some corrupted plant gems prove to be no match for Onion.
Car Trouble: Greg's van gets stuck in the mud and Steven asks Garnet to help push it out.
Storytime: Pearl projects herself into a story Connie is telling and reacts negatively when the heroine doesn't act the way she would. Meanwhile Amethyst attempts to set some tropical fish in a pet store free.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 07:46:04. [CVDB478650] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:14:32. [Issue ID 1326686]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Coleman Engle,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Mad Rupert,Rebekka Dunlap
ComicInfo.Inker: Coleman Engle,Frans Boukas,Grace Kraft,Mad Rupert,Rebekka Dunlap
